mapper.sql: a.record_id AS "recordId", a.relation_id AS "relationId", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.address AS "recordAddress", a.cause AS "cause", a.host AS "host", a.note_taker AS "noteTaker", a.patient AS "patient", a.doctor AS "doctor", a.other_participants AS "otherParticipants", a.record_content AS "recordContent", a.module_type AS "moduleType", a.type AS "type", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u7 ON u7.id = a.host LEFT JOIN sys_user u8 ON u8.id = a.note_taker LEFT JOIN sys_user u10 ON u10.id = a.doctor LEFT JOIN sys_user u11 ON u11.id = a.other_participants
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record_info( record_id, relation_id, start_time, end_time, address, cause, host, note_taker, patient, doctor, other_participants, record_content, module_type, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{recordId}, #{relationId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{recordAddress}, #{cause}, #{host}, #{noteTaker}, #{patient}, #{doctor}, #{otherParticipants}, #{recordContent}, #{moduleType}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE record_info SET start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, address = #{address}, cause = #{cause}, host = #{host}, note_taker = #{noteTaker}, patient = #{patient}, doctor = #{doctor}, other_participants = #{otherParticipants}, record_content = #{recordContent} WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
